long_description: This essential map provides road data, recommended rides, bike paths, bike shops, parks and more-everything you need for biking around Boston. Newly updated to include the latest, post Big Dig routes and warnings. Includes information on ferries, cycling organizations, local books, traffic safety, pothole hotlines and theft prevention. Contour lines denote hilly terrain. Scale 1:25,000. Published by Rubel Bike Maps; copyright 2007.
short_description: This essential map provides road data, recommended rides, bike paths, bike shops, parks and more-everything you need for biking around Boston.
